translations: n.[植]药草；[植]草本植物（herb 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Many herbs can be grown indoors.
sentences.translation: 很多草本植物能在室内种植。

sentences.sentence: The medical uses of herbs are legion.
sentences.translation: 草本植物的医药效用数不胜数。

sentences.sentence: Parsley is one of the most commonly used herbs.
sentences.translation: 欧芹是最常用的草药之一。
